title: Magical Manali Adventure
description: Experience the breathtaking beauty of Manali with snow-capped peaks, adventure activities, and serene landscapes. Perfect for those seeking mountain adventures and peaceful moments in nature.

itinerary.title: Arrival & Local Sightseeing
itinerary.description: Arrive in Manali and check into your hotel. Explore the local markets and visit Hadimba Temple. Evening at leisure.

itinerary.title: Rohtang Pass Adventure
itinerary.description: Early morning departure to Rohtang Pass. Enjoy snow activities and stunning mountain views. Return to Manali by evening.

itinerary.title: Solang Valley Thrills
itinerary.description: Adventure day at Solang Valley with paragliding, zorbing, and cable car rides. Enjoy the panoramic mountain views.

itinerary.title: River Rafting & Local Culture
itinerary.description: Experience white water rafting on the Beas River. Visit local villages and interact with friendly locals.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Check out from hotel and depart for your onward journey with beautiful memories of Manali.

title: Goa Beach Paradise
description: Relax on pristine beaches, enjoy water sports, and experience the vibrant nightlife of Goa. Perfect for beach lovers and those seeking a tropical getaway.

itinerary.title: Arrival & Beach Relaxation
itinerary.description: Arrive in Goa and check into your beach resort. Spend the afternoon relaxing on the beach and enjoying the sunset.

itinerary.title: Water Sports & Beach Fun
itinerary.description: Full day of water sports activities including jet skiing, parasailing, and banana boat rides. Beach lunch and evening at leisure.

itinerary.title: Heritage & Culture
itinerary.description: Explore the rich Portuguese heritage of Old Goa. Visit churches, museums, and local markets. Spice plantation tour in the afternoon.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Check out from resort and depart for your onward journey with wonderful memories of Goa.

title: Rajasthan Royal Heritage
description: Immerse yourself in the royal heritage of Rajasthan with magnificent palaces, colorful markets, and rich culture. Experience the grandeur of the Pink City.

itinerary.title: Arrival & City Introduction
itinerary.description: Arrive in Jaipur and check into your heritage hotel. Evening orientation and welcome dinner with traditional Rajasthani cuisine.

itinerary.title: Amber Fort & City Palace
itinerary.description: Visit the magnificent Amber Fort and explore the City Palace complex. Learn about royal history and architecture.

itinerary.title: Hawa Mahal & Local Markets
itinerary.description: Photograph the iconic Hawa Mahal and explore the bustling local markets. Shop for traditional handicrafts and textiles.

itinerary.title: Nahargarh Fort & Sunset
itinerary.description: Visit Nahargarh Fort for panoramic city views and enjoy a spectacular sunset over the Pink City.

itinerary.title: Jantar Mantar & Free Time
itinerary.description: Explore the astronomical instruments at Jantar Mantar. Afternoon free for leisure activities or optional tours.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Check out from hotel and depart for your onward journey with royal memories of Rajasthan.

title: Kerala Backwater Bliss
description: Experience the tranquil backwaters of Kerala with houseboat cruises, traditional cuisine, and lush green landscapes. Perfect for relaxation and rejuvenation.

itinerary.title: Arrival & Houseboat Boarding
itinerary.description: Arrive in Alleppey and board your traditional houseboat. Begin your backwater cruise with lunch onboard.

itinerary.title: Backwater Exploration
itinerary.description: Full day exploring the serene backwaters, visiting local villages, and enjoying traditional Kerala cuisine.

itinerary.title: Ayurvedic Wellness
itinerary.description: Experience authentic Ayurvedic treatments and spa therapies. Afternoon free for relaxation or optional activities.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Check out from houseboat and depart for your onward journey with peaceful memories of Kerala.

title: Ladakh High Altitude Adventure
description: Explore the rugged beauty of Ladakh with high-altitude lakes, ancient monasteries, and breathtaking mountain passes. An adventure for the bold and adventurous.

itinerary.title: Arrival & Acclimatization
itinerary.description: Arrive in Leh and rest for acclimatization. Light activities and medical check-up to ensure fitness for high altitude.

itinerary.title: Leh Local Sightseeing
itinerary.description: Explore Leh Palace, Shanti Stupa, and local markets. Continue acclimatization with moderate activities.

itinerary.title: Pangong Lake Excursion
itinerary.description: Drive to the famous Pangong Lake through Chang La pass. Enjoy the crystal-clear blue waters and stunning landscapes.

itinerary.title: Nubra Valley Adventure
itinerary.description: Cross Khardung La pass to reach Nubra Valley. Experience double-humped camel safari and visit Diskit Monastery.

itinerary.title: Monasteries & Culture
itinerary.description: Visit ancient monasteries including Hemis, Thiksey, and Shey. Learn about Buddhist culture and traditions.

itinerary.title: Magnetic Hill & Confluence
itinerary.description: Visit the mysterious Magnetic Hill and confluence of Indus and Zanskar rivers. Experience the unique phenomena.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Check out from hotel and depart for your onward journey with unforgettable memories of Ladakh.

title: Mysore Palace & Gardens
description: Discover the royal heritage of Mysore with its magnificent palace, beautiful gardens, and rich cultural traditions. Experience the grandeur of South Indian architecture.

itinerary.title: Arrival & Palace Tour
itinerary.description: Arrive in Mysore and check into your hotel. Visit the magnificent Mysore Palace and explore its royal halls and courtyards.

itinerary.title: Gardens & Temple Visit
itinerary.description: Visit the beautiful Brindavan Gardens and Chamundi Hill temple. Enjoy the musical fountain show in the evening.

itinerary.title: Silk Weaving & Departure
itinerary.description: Visit a traditional silk weaving center and learn about Mysore silk. Check out and depart for your onward journey.
